title: Coating for separator or cathode of lithium—sulfur or silicon—sulfur battery

classifications.description: Methods of deposition of the material
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Electrodes based on metals, Si or alloys
Synthetic resins, e.g. thermoplastics or thermosetting resins
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by their combination with electrodes
Manufacturing processes of separators, membranes or diaphragms
Electric battery cell making including coating or impregnating

abstract: A battery with a sulfur-containing cathode, an anode, and a separator between the cathode and the anode has a coating comprising a single-lithium ion conductor on at least one of the cathode or the separator.
claims: 2. A battery according to claim 1, wherein the coating further comprises a binder.
3. A battery according to claim 1, wherein the anode is a lithium-containing anode or a silicon-containing anode.
4. A device comprising a battery according to claim 1.
6. A battery according to claim 5, wherein the coating further comprises a binder.
7. A battery according to claim 5, wherein the anode is a lithium-containing anode or a silicon-containing anode.
8. A device comprising a battery according to claim 5.
10. A method according to claim 9, wherein the coating further comprises a binder.
11. A method according to claim 9, wherein the anode is a lithium-containing anode or a silicon-containing anode.
